description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nBonecraft:
After this creature {ACTION_attacks} an ally with less than 35% {STAT_health}, it is killed, then this creature grants 50% of its {STAT_attack}, {STAT_intelligence}, and {STAT_defense} to all your other creatures.
name: Bone Scythe
